Articles.Content: i downloaded AVP and opm with its dependencies,..yet i dont see the outer planets, nor the clouds for AVP. Did i do something wrong?

16 hours ago, lionbeast321 said:

Did i do something wrong?

That would be a yes.

Did you download all the dependencies for both OPM (kopernicus for the version of KSP you're using, community terrain textures pack) and AVP (the AVP textures in a resolution of your choice- 2k, 4k or 8k- plus EVE, scatterer and module manager)? Did you install them in the right places (OPM, Kopernicus, CTTP, EVE and scatterer go directly into GameData, I think AVP is a bit more fiddly but there should be instructions in the readme included in the install or on the forum/github/spacedock pages)? Any other mods, version of KSP, logs would all be helpful here.

On 8/19/2020 at 12:57 PM, jimmymcgoochie said:

Did you download all the dependencies for both OPM (kopernicus for the version of KSP you're using, community terrain textures pack) and AVP (the AVP textures in a resolution of your choice- 2k, 4k or 8k- plus EVE, scatterer and module manager)? Any other mods, version of KSP, logs would all be helpful here.

I got it! I had to work out EVE and its configs
